mapper.select: SELECT AP_CODE, AP_OSCODE, AP_FROMDPCODE, AP_FROMOFCODE, AP_DATE, CG_NAME, DP_NAME FROM AP INNER JOIN CG ON AP.AP_CGTYPE = CG.CG_TYPE INNER JOIN DP ON AP.AP_FROMDPCODE = DP.DP_CODE AND AP.AP_FROMOFCODE = DP.DP_OFCODE WHERE AP_TODPCODE = #{ap_todpcode} AND AP_TOOFCODE = #{ap_toofcode}
